author: Charles Campbell
title: CNN’s Don Lemon: Chicago Torture Wasn’t ‘Evil’ – ‘They Had Bad Home Training’
text:
CNN Employees File Class Action Lawsuit Against The Network 
However, Lemon was hesitant to call the act evil, instead saying it was a result of bad parenting. 
“I don’t think it’s evil,” said the CNN host, who is black. “I think these are young people and I think they had bad home training. I think that — when I say who is raising these people, I have no idea who is raising these young people.”   
Many Twitter users were enraged that he was minimizing the problem. @donlemon @CNN Bad home training? Are you effing kidding me? How far are you willing to take your own narrative? Discipable at any level. 
— Andy Clark (@poof0017) January 5, 2017 Video: IDIOT Don Lemon of @CNN says racist torture of white special needs man is just "bad home training" https://t.co/uYUDgATj9p 
— Amy Moreno (@VivaLaAmes) January 5, 2017 
Others suggested that if the races of the perpetrators and victim were reversed, Lemon wouldn’t have a problem calling it evil.
